title: No S
body: Got 96% KP as support, earnt more gold than the top laner, No s. had least deaths on team. surely that is a bug

replies.body: maybe your allies didn't take advantage of your dives enough and you went over the 2 deaths limit, which is what i try to keep under >.< + get a lot of farm and assists
maybe you didn't contribute enough dmg, tanking or assists?
i went 3/4/22. did more damage than our top, was responsible for most of the tower dives and whatnot. Im pretty sure if the game was a victory i would have gotten an S

Not a  bug.

 It's all relative to how everyone else on the server is doing with the **same champ in the same role** (so no point comparing your gold to your top laner or your deaths to everyone else). 

From Riot:

> It’s based on the champion and role that you just played in a game. So, for example, we look at Annie mid differently to Annie support. We take a series of performance metrics and compare how you do to all other players in your region in your champion / position combination. It is percentile driven - so earning a high score means** you performed in the top x% of players** on that champ in that position. The grade itself governs the point gains.

[(Source)](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery)

[Basically grades similarly to a bell curve](http://study.com/academy/lesson/bell-curve-definition-impact-on-grades.html), meaning we have a server full of really good players.
Still, I'm pretty sure 97% KP within 30 min is pretty top notch.
Theres been an update where for support they pretty much weigh your assists as 'kills'. So pretty much like any other lane but you are measure in assist than kill
